thread.section_title: Security Camera Warehouse Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Security Camera Warehouse | www.security-camera-warehouse.com
thread.title: Larry Botsford
thread.title_full: Security Camera Warehouse reviewed by Larry Botsford

author: Larry Botsford
title: Larry Botsford
text: We were very happy with the info we obtained during the initial call and after several days decided to make the purchase. During set up we had to call several times for assistance in the set up ( I am not very tech oriented ) and after a short time we had our system up and running. I was very happy with the company and the system is exactly what we wanted.
